sentences.en: But the closest pineapple grower is in Florida.
sentences.cn: 但最近种植菠萝的地方在佛罗里达州.

sentences.en: Doses presented in terms of the proprietary product are more meaningful to the grower.
sentences.cn: 用专利品来表示使用剂量对栽培者来说最有意义.

sentences.en: It may subsequently become a weak grower and a distinctly biennial cropper.
sentences.cn: 随后会引起树势衰弱,明显两年结一次果.

sentences.en: Mr. White is a successful fruit grower in this area.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生是这个地方成功的果农.

sentences.en: Tea grower weighs crop light quality, add equipment stale is made first.
sentences.cn: 茶农重产量轻质量, 加上初制设备陈旧.

sentences.en: The fruit grower was surprised by his " almondprune " plants.
sentences.cn: 那个果园主看到这种“杏梅树 ” 时大为惊喜.

sentences.en: The grower can modify his cultural program.
sentences.cn: 生产者可以修改栽培措施.

sentences.en: The grower is no longer in full control of the nutritional situation.
sentences.cn: 栽培者就再也不能完全控制营养状况.

sentences.en: The grower warrants these plants free from disease.
sentences.cn: 种植主保证这些植物无病.

sentences.en: The merchandiser and the fruit grower have blamed each other for bruised unattractive fruit.
sentences.cn: 由于果实损伤而外观不美,常常引起经销人与水果生产者互相责怪.

sentences.en: The state's apple growers are fighting an uphill battle against foreign competition.
sentences.cn: 该州的苹果种植者们正在与外来竞争进行艰难的抗争。

sentences.en: This gives the grower a better chance to disk it under.
sentences.cn: 这给种植者以很好的机会将之耕翻.

sentences.en: This rose is a slow grower.
We are a major grower, producer and marketer of tropical commodities.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家热带商品的主要种植者 、 生产商以及营销商.

words.tran_cn: 长大的；成年的；长满某物的
生长；变成；栽培（grow的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 种植者，栽培者，以某种方式生长的植物
trans.tran_en: A grower is a person who grows large quantities of a particular plant or crop in order to sell them
